entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
